response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I'm excited to present our top-of-the-line product, which has been meticulously designed and crafted to meet the highest standards of quality and performance. This exceptional item is valued at $15,000 to us due to its unique features, durability, and the benefits it offers. Considering its unparalleled capabilities, I kindly invite you to consider acquiring this product at the same price point. Should you have any questions or require further information, please don't hesitate to reach out. I look forward to the possibility of working with you.", "product_price": 15000}
